rules_text:
Amass Soldiers 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
Proliferate X times. [i](To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
